name: GenCross V 0.0.1
description:
This is an alpha for GenCross.  GenCross is an application that allows you to make, play,  and share mini crosswords. Crosswords are saved as .mncd files

 Please note that being an alpha, it will probably be glitchy. Feel free to respectfully share bugs you find in the comments.

If you liked this app and want to support it, suggest a clue at: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfDa_9KsQVFVqu4yNy_p-_KtRcchzt7TXmG0a48...
